# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/themes.py
@source-hash: d318132e8cdf69b7
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:59:08Z

## Purpose
Simple module that creates the default theme instance for the Rich library's styling system. Acts as a centralized entry point for accessing the default theme configuration.

## Key Components
- **DEFAULT** (L5): Global constant containing the default Theme instance, initialized with DEFAULT_STYLES

## Dependencies
- **DEFAULT_STYLES** (L1): Imported styling definitions from default_styles module
- **Theme** (L2): Theme class from theme module that wraps style definitions

## Architecture
This is a minimal configuration module that follows the pattern of centralizing default instances. The module creates a single global theme object that can be imported and used throughout the Rich library without requiring repeated Theme instantiation.

## Usage Pattern
Other modules can import `DEFAULT` to access the standard Rich theme without needing to know about the underlying DEFAULT_STYLES or Theme class structure.
